Title: Incomplete Docstrings
Content:
Throughout the [codebase](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/), there are several parts that have a incomplete docstring:


* In the [relayMessage](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/universal/CrossDomainMessenger.sol#L362-L474) function of the [`CrossDomainMessenger`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/universal/CrossDomainMessenger.sol) contract, the `_mntValue` parameter is not documented.
* The [OwnershipTransferred](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/CrossDomainOwnable3.sol#L26-L30) event of the [`CrossDomainOwnable3`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/CrossDomainOwnable3.sol) contract does not document what the `previousOwner`, `newOwner`, and `isLocal` parameters are.
* The [TokenRatioUpdated](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/GasPriceOracle.sol#L41), [`OwnershipTransferred`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/GasPriceOracle.sol#L42), and [`OperatorUpdated`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/GasPriceOracle.sol#L43) events in the [`GasPriceOracle`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/GasPriceOracle.sol) contract do not document what their parameters are.
* In the [transferOwnership](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/GasPriceOracle.sol#L72-L77) function of the [`GasPriceOracle`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/GasPriceOracle.sol) contract, the `_owner` parameter is not documented.
* In the [depositMNT](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/L1StandardBridge.sol#L198-L204) function of the [`L1StandardBridge`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/L1StandardBridge.sol) contract, the `_amount` parameter is not documented.
* In the [depositMNTTo](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/L1StandardBridge.sol#L220-L227) function of the [`L1StandardBridge`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/L1StandardBridge.sol) contract, the `_amount` parameter is not documented.
* In the [bridgeETH](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/L2StandardBridge.sol#L475-L477) function of the [`L2StandardBridge`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L2/L2StandardBridge.sol) contract, the `_value` parameter is not documented.
* In the [l1Token](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/universal/OptimismMintableERC20.sol#L122-L124) function of the[`OptimismMintableERC20`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/universal/OptimismMintableERC20.sol) contract, not all return values are documented. The same happens in the [l2Bridge](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/universal/OptimismMintableERC20.sol#L130-L132), [remoteToken](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/universal/OptimismMintableERC20.sol#L138-L140), and the [bridge](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/universal/OptimismMintableERC20.sol#L146-L148) functions of the same contract.
* In the [WithdrawalProven](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/OptimismPortal.sol#L115-L119) event of the [`OptimismPortal`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/OptimismPortal.sol) contract, the `from` and `to` parameters are not documented.
* In the [initialize](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/OptimismPortal.sol#L176-L180) function of the [`OptimismPortal`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/OptimismPortal.sol) contract, the `_paused` parameter is not documented.
* In the [minimumGasLimit](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/OptimismPortal.sol#L207-L209) function of the [`OptimismPortal`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/OptimismPortal.sol) contract, the `_byteCount` and the return value are not documented.
* In the [initialize](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/SystemConfig.sol#L133-L153) function of the [`SystemConfig`](https://github.com/mantlenetworkio/mantle-v2/blob/e29d360904db5e5ec81888885f7b7250f8255895/packages/contracts-bedrock/contracts/L1/SystemConfig.sol) contract, the `_baseFee` parameter is not documented.


Consider thoroughly documenting all functions/events (and their parameters or return values) that are part of any contract's public API. When writing docstrings, consider following the [Ethereum Natural Specification Format](https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/natspec-format.html) (NatSpec).


***Update:** Acknowledged, not resolved. The Mantle team stated:*



> *Will fix later. it's not a logic issue.*
